predefined-backgrounds.description: List of file names relative to the spreed/img/backgrounds/ web path, e.g. `2_home.jpg`

predefined-backgrounds-v2.description: List of file paths relative to the server web root with leading slash, e.g. `/apps/spreed/img/backgrounds/2_home.jpg`
